sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, SYSTEM_LEVEL, LAST_ACTIVE, EMPLOYEE_ID, STATUS_USER, ACTION_DATE, IS_ACTIVE_DIR, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#userName#, dbms_crypto.hash(to_clob(#password#), 2), #sysLevel#, SYSDATE-(1/(24*60)), #employeeId#, '1', SYSDATE-(1/(24*60)), #isActiveDirectory#, #updateBy#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT USERNAME AS userName, SYSTEM_LEVEL AS sysLevel, STATUS_USER AS statusUser, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS employeeName, EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeId, ACTION_DATE AS changeDate, IS_ACTIVE_DIR AS isActiveDirectory, LOGIN_SESSION AS loginSession, LAST_ACTIVE AS lastActive FROM USERS US JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON US.EMPLOYEE_ID = EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE LOWER(US.USERNAME) = LOWER(#username#)
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(USERNAME)=LOWER(#userName#) AND PASSWORD=dbms_crypto.hash(to_clob(#password#), 2)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = dbms_crypto.hash(to_clob(#newPassword#), 2) WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
UPDATE USERS SET SYSTEM_LEVEL=#sysLevel# WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = dbms_crypto.hash(to_clob('12345'), 2) WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
UPDATE USERS SET STATUS_USER = '0' WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
UPDATE USERS SET STATUS_USER = '1' WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
UPDATE USERS SET ACTION_DATE = (SYSDATE + (1/(24 * 60))) WHERE LOWER(USERNAME) = LOWER(#userName#)
